script:module:
REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
dim ShipSheet as object dim ShipForm as object global g_emptylst() as string
const _ShipTypeCnt = 11 const _ShipColCnt = 7
dim ShipCol(_ShipTypeCnt,_ShipColCnt) as integer dim ShipRow(_ShipTypeCnt) as integer dim ShipNames(_ShipTypeCnt) as string
global const _ShipViper = 1 global const _ShipMarkVII = 2 global const _ShipRaptor = 3 global const _ShipAssaultRaptor = 4 global const _ShipCivilian = 5 global const _ShipNONE = 6 global const _ShipBasestar = 7 global const _ShipRaider = 8 global const _ShipHeavy = 9 global const _ShipCenturion = 10 global const _ShipOccForces = 11
const _ShipColName = 1 const _ShipColOffBrd = 2 const _ShipColSector = 3 const _ShipColDamaged = 4 const _ShipColDestroyed = 5 const _ShipColSpecial = 6 const _ShipColCylonFleet = 7
const _BaseDamageCol = 8 const _BaseDamageRow = 40
global const _ShipStatusOffboard = 0 global const _ShipStatusSector1 = 1 global const _ShipStatusSector6 = 6 global const _ShipStatusDamaged = 7 global const _ShipStatusDestroyed = 8 global const _ShipStatusLocked = 9 global const _ShipStatusPrepped = 10 global const _ShipStatusCylonFleet1 = 11 global const _ShipStatusCylonFleet6 = 16 global const _ShipStatusActivate = 17 global const _ShipStatusRemoved = 18
const _ScarCol = 15 const _ScarRow = 17
sub GetShipSheet if ShipSheet <> NULL then exit sub end if
ShipSheet= ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Ships") ShipForm = ShipSheet.DrawPage.Forms.GetByName("formShips")
PopulateShipLoc Randomize end sub
' ****************************** SHIP FUNCTIONS ****************************
' each ship type has the following columns: Name, OffBrd, Sector, Damaged, Destroyed, Pursuit, Special sub PopulateShipLoc ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColName) = 1 ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColDamaged) = ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColName) + 4 ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColName) + 5 ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColSpecial) = ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipCol(_ShipViper, _ShipColCylonFleet) = 0 ShipRow(_ShipViper) = 3 ShipNames(_ShipViper) = "Viper"
ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColName) = 1 ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColDamaged) = ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColName) + 4 ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColName) + 5 ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColSpecial) = ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipCol(_ShipMarkVII, _ShipColCylonFleet) = 0 ShipRow(_ShipMarkVII) = 15 ShipNames(_ShipMarkVII) = "Viper Mark VII"
ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColName) = 1 ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColSector) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColSpecial) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColCylonFleet) = 0 ShipRow(_ShipRaptor) = 40 ShipNames(_ShipRaptor) = "Raptor"
ShipCol(_ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipColName) = 1 ShipCol(_ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColName) + 4 ShipCol(_ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipColSpecial) = ShipCol(_ShipRaptor, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipCol(_ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipColCylonFleet) = 0 ShipRow(_ShipAssaultRaptor) = 49 ShipNames(_ShipAssaultRaptor) = "Assault Raptor"
ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColName) = 1 ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColName) + 4 ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColSpecial) = ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColName) + 5 ShipCol(_ShipCivilian, _ShipColCylonFleet) = 0 ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) = 23 ShipNames(_ShipCivilian) = "Civilian"
ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColName) = 8 ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColSpecial) = ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColName) + 5 ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColCylonFleet) = ShipCol(_ShipBasestar, _ShipColName) + 4 ShipRow(_ShipBasestar) = 35 ShipNames(_ShipBasestar) = "Basestar"
ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColName) = 8 ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColDestroyed) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColSpecial) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColCylonFleet) = ShipCol(_ShipRaider, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipRow(_ShipRaider) = 3 ShipNames(_ShipRaider) = "Raider"
ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColName) = 8 ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColName) + 2 ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColSpecial) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColCylonFleet) = ShipCol(_ShipHeavy, _ShipColName) + 4 ShipRow(_ShipHeavy) = 27 ShipNames(_ShipHeavy) = "Heavy Raider"
ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColName) = 14 ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColName) + 3 ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColName) + 5 ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColDestroyed) = ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColSpecial) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipCenturion, _ShipColCylonFleet) = 0 ShipRow(_ShipCenturion) = 27 ShipNames(_ShipCenturion) = "Centurion"
ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColName) = 14 ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColOffBrd) = ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColName) + 1 ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColSector) = ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColName) + 4 ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColDamaged) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColDestroyed) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColSpecial) = 0 ShipCol(_ShipOccForces, _ShipColCylonFleet) = 0 ShipRow(_ShipOccForces) = 20 ShipNames(_ShipOccForces) = "Occupation Force" end sub
function ShipCnt (shiptype as integer) as integer dim tmp() as integer
tmp = Array(0, 8, 0, 4, 0, 12, 0, 2, 16, 4, 4, 4) if UseCylonFleet() then tmp(_ShipViper) = 6 tmp(_ShipMarkVII) = 4 tmp(_ShipRaider) = 20 end if if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then tmp(_ShipAssaultRaptor) = 4 end if ShipCnt = tmp(shiptype) end function
function MoveUp (FromSector as integer) MoveUp = (FromSector Mod 6) + 1 end function
function MoveDown (FromSector as integer) ' we have to do this because of a bug in the Mod function if FromSector = 1 then MoveDown = 6 else MoveDown = FromSector - 1 end if end function
function GetShipStatus (ShipType as integer, ShipID as integer) as integer
if ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColOffBrd), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string <> "" then GetShipStatus = _ShipStatusOffboard
elseif ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSector) > 0 and ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSector), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string <> "" then GetShipStatus = ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSector), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string
elseif ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDamaged) > 0 and ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDamaged), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string <> "" then GetShipStatus = _ShipStatusDamaged
elseif ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDestroyed) > 0 and ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDestroyed), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string <> "" then GetShipStatus = _ShipStatusDestroyed
elseif ShipType = _ShipCivilian then if ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType,_ShipColSpecial),ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "Locked" then GetShipStatus = _ShipStatusLocked else GetShipStatus = _ShipStatusPrepped end if
elseif ShipType = _ShipViper or ShipType = _ShipMarkVII or ShipType = _ShipAssaultRaptor then ' this could only happen if we have a piloted viper - we're not off board (Reserves), in a Sector, damaged, destroyed, or a Civilian, so this is for Pilots. GetShipStatus = _ShipStatusActivate
elseif ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColCylonFleet) > 0 and ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType,_ShipColCylonFleet), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string <> "" then GetShipStatus = 10 + val(ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType,_ShipColCylonFleet),ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string)
end if
end function
function GetShipName (ShipType as integer, ShipID as integer) as string GetShipSheet if (shiptype =_ShipViper or shiptype = _ShipMarkVII or shiptype = _ShipAssaultRaptor) and GetViperPilot(shipID, ShipType) <> "" then GetShipName = ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColName), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string & " (" & GetViperPilot(shipID, ShipType) & ")" else GetShipName = ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColName), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string end if end function 'GetShipName
function GetSelectedShipType as integer dim tmplst(), tmpname as string dim i as integer
GetShipSheet
GetSelectedShipType = _ShipNONE tmplst = ShipForm.getByName("lstShipType").SelectedItems() if ubound(tmplst) = -1 then exit function end if
tmpname = left(ShipForm.getByName("lstShipType").StringItemList(val(tmplst(0))), len(ShipForm.getByName("lstShipType").StringItemList(val(tmplst(0))))-1) for i = 1 to _ShipTypeCnt if tmpname = ShipNames(i) then GetSelectedShipType = i exit function end if next i end function 'GetSelectedShipType
sub UpdateShipTypeList dim shiptypes(_ShipTypeCnt) as string dim typeID, typecnt as integer GetShipSheet 'update what ships are available based on the phase of the game
typecnt = 0 if IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then typecnt = 1 shiptypes(1) = "Vipers" if UseCylonFleet() then typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Viper Mark VIIs" end if end if
typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Raptors" if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Assault Raptors" end if typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Civilians" typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "---------------"
if IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then ' base game or beginning of Pegasus typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Basestars" typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Raiders" typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Heavy Raiders" typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Centurions" end if
if IsGamePhase(_PhaseOnNewCaprica) or IsGamePhase(_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then typecnt = typecnt + 1 shiptypes(typecnt) = "Occupation Forces" end if
ShipForm.getByName("lstShipType").StringItemList = g_emptylst() ShipForm.getByName("lstShipType").StringItemList = shiptypes() ShipForm.getByName("lstShip").StringItemList = g_emptylst() ShipForm.getByName("lstShipAction").StringItemList = g_emptylst() end sub 'UpdateShipTypeList
function GetSelectedShipIDs as variant dim tmplst() as string dim retlst() as integer dim selidx, shipid, i, retid as integer dim shipname as string
GetShipSheet
tmplst= ShipForm.getByName("lstShip").SelectedItems() if ubound(tmplst) = -1 then GetSelectedShipIDs = retlst() exit function end if
redim retlst(ubound(tmplst)) for retid = 0 to ubound(tmplst) selidx = val(tmplst(retid))
shipname = ShipForm.getByName("lstShip").StringItemList(selidx) if instr(shipname,"(") > 0 then shipname = trim(Left(shipname, instr(shipname,"(")-1)) end if
if GetSelectedShipType() <> _ShipCivilian then retlst(retid) = Right(shipname, 2) else retlst(retid) = 1 + ASC(Right(shipname,1)) - ASC("A") end if next retid GetSelectedShipIDs = retlst() end function
'return the ID of the first offboard ship function GetAvailableShip (shiptype as integer, optional bystatus as integer) as integer dim i, maxships as integer
GetShipSheet if IsMissing(bystatus) then bystatus = 0 end if
GetAvailableShip = 0 maxships = ShipCnt(shiptype) for i = 1 to maxships if GetShipStatus(shiptype, i) = bystatus then GetAvailableShip = i exit for end if next i end function 'GetAvailableShip
'how many of a given ship are available to be deployed? function GetAvailableShipCnt (shiptype as integer) as integer dim i, maxships as integer dim shipcount as integer GetShipSheet
shipcount = 0 maxships = ShipCnt(shiptype) for i = 1 to maxships if GetShipStatus(shiptype, i) = 0 then shipcount = shipcount + 1 end if next i GetAvailableShipCnt = shipcount end function 'GetAvailableShipCnt
sub UpdateShips ' dim ctl_ships, ctl_shipActions as object dim ships(20), statusstr as string dim shiptype, shipstatus, tmpcnt, shipid as integer dim typecnt(17) as integer
GetShipSheet
'Generally, we only want to show: ' 1 off-board/reserve ship (status 0) ' all on-board ships (status 1-6) [except piloted vipers] ' 1 damaged ship (status 7) ' 1 destroyed ship* (status 8) [except destroyed civilians] ' 1 locked ship (status 9 - civilian only) ' 1 prepped ship (status 10 - civilian only)
' just show all the ships except piloted vipers..it's too cumbersome this way
shiptype = GetSelectedShipType() if shiptype = _shipNONE then ShipForm.getByName("lstShip").StringItemList = g_emptylst() ShipForm.getByName("lstShipAction").StringItemList = g_emptylst() exit sub end if ' typecnt=Array(99,99,99,99,99,99,99,1,1,1,1,99,99,99,99,99,99,0) ' if shiptype=_ShipCivilian then ' typecnt(8)=0 ' end if tmpcnt = 0 for shipid = 1 to ShipCnt(shiptype) shipstatus = GetShipStatus(shiptype, shipid) ' if typecnt(shipstatus) > 0 AND _ 'don't show piloted vipers if NOT ((shiptype = _ShipViper and GetViperPilot(shipID, _ShipViper) <> "") OR _ (shiptype = _ShipMarkVII and GetViperPilot(shipID, _ShipMarkVII) <> "") OR _ (shiptype = _ShipAssaultRaptor and GetViperPilot(shipID, _ShipAssaultRaptor) <> ""))_ then tmpcnt = tmpcnt + 1 select case shipstatus case _ShipStatusSector1 to _ShipStatusSector6 if shiptype = _ShipOccForces then if shipstatus = 1 then statusstr = " (Occupation Authority)" elseif shipstatus = 2 then statusstr = " (Breeder's Canyon)" else statusstr = " (Shipyard)" end if else statusstr = " (Sector " & shipstatus & ")" end if
case _ShipStatusDamaged statusstr = " (Damaged)"
case _ShipStatusDestroyed statusstr = " (Destroyed)"
case _ShipStatusLocked statusstr = " (Locked)"
case _ShipStatusPrepped statusstr = " (Prepped)"
case _ShipStatusCylonFleet1 to _ShipStatusCylonFleet6 statusstr = " (Cylon Sector " & shipstatus - 10 & ")"
case else statusstr = "" end select ships(tmpcnt) = GetShipName(shiptype, shipid) & statusstr if shiptype = _ShipRaider and ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_ScarCol, _ScarRow).value = shipid then ships(tmpcnt) = "SCAR: " & ships(tmpcnt) end if ' typecnt(shipstatus) = typecnt(shipstatus)-1 end if next shipid
ShipForm.getByName("lstShip").StringItemList = g_emptylst() ShipForm.getByName("lstShip").StringItemList = ships()
ShipForm.getByName("lstShipAction").StringItemList = g_emptylst() SetExecShip FALSE end sub 'Updateships
sub UpdateShipActions dim ctl_shipActions as object dim shiptype, shipid, shipstatus, actioncnt, i as integer dim shipactions(13) as string dim tmpstr as string dim shipIDs() as integer
GetShipSheet
ctl_shipActions = ShipForm.getByName("lstShipAction") ctl_shipActions.StringItemList = g_emptylst() SetExecShip FALSE
shiptype = GetSelectedShipType() shipIDs = GetSelectedShipIDs() shipstatus = GetShipStatus(shiptype, shipIDs(0)) ' check to make sure all the selected ships have the same status for i = 1 to ubound(shipIDs) if shipstatus <> GetShipStatus(shiptype, shipIDs(i)) then exit sub end if next i
select case shipstatus case _ShipStatusOffboard 'Off Board/Reserves if shiptype = _ShipViper or shiptype = _ShipMarkVII or shiptype = _ShipAssaultRaptor then 'we can only launch in two sectors shipactions(1) = "Launch into Sector 5" shipactions(2) = "Launch into Sector 6" if shiptype = _ShipAssaultRaptor then shipactions(3) = "Destroy Ship" else shipactions(3) = "Damage Ship" end if
elseif shiptype = _ShipRaptor then shipactions(1) = "Destroy Ship"
elseif shiptype = _ShipCenturion then shipactions(1) = "Board Galactica"
elseif shiptype = _ShipOccForces then shipactions(1) = "Deploy on New Caprica"
else for i = 1 to 6 shipactions(i) = "Deploy in Sector " & i next i if shiptype = _ShipCivilian then shipactions(7) = "Destroy Ship"
else 'cylon ship (raider, heavy, or basestar) if UseCylonFleet() then for i = 1 to 6 shipactions(6 + i)="Cylon Fleet: Sector " & i next i end if end if
end if
case _ShipStatusSector1 to _ShipStatusSector6 'deployed in a sector. Note: Raptor can never have this status ' all other ships except heavy raider can move +/- 1 sector or be destroyed. ' Viper can be damaged or removed. ' heavy raider can only move in 1 direction and can Board Galactica if in sector 5 or 6 select case shiptype case _ShipBasestar if GetBasestarDamage(shipid) < 2 then shipactions(1) = "Damage Ship" shipactions(2) = "Destroy Ship" else shipactions(1) = "Destroy Ship" end if
case _ShipHeavy if shipstatus = 1 or shipstatus = 2 then shipactions(1) = "Move to Sector " & MoveDown(shipstatus) elseif shipstatus = 3 or shipstatus = 4 then shipactions(1) = "Move to Sector " & MoveUp(shipstatus) else shipactions(1) = "Board Galactica" end if shipactions(2) = "Destroy Ship"
case _ShipCenturion shipactions(1) = "Advance Centurion" shipactions(2) = "Destroy Centurion"
case _ShipOccForces if shipstatus = 1 or shipstatus = 2 then shipactions(1) = "Advance Occ Force" else shipactions(1) = "Destroy Civilian Ship" end if shipactions(2) = "Destroy Occ Force"
case _ShipViper, _ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipRaider, _ShipCivilian shipactions(1) = "Move to Sector " & MoveUp(shipstatus) shipactions(2) = "Move to Sector " & MoveDown(shipstatus) shipactions(3) = "Destroy Ship" if shiptype = _ShipViper then shipactions(4) = "Damage Ship" else 'Civilian or Raider shipactions(4) = "" end if shipactions(5) = "Return to Reserves"
case _ShipMarkVII shipactions(1) = "Move to Sector " & MoveUp(MoveUp(shipstatus)) shipactions(2) = "Move to Sector " & MoveUp(shipstatus) shipactions(3) = "Move to Sector " & MoveDown(shipstatus) shipactions(4) = "Move to Sector " & MoveDown(MoveDown(shipstatus)) shipactions(5) = "Destroy Ship" shipactions(6) = "Damage Ship" shipactions(7) = "Return to Reserves"
end select 'shiptype for ships in space
case _ShipStatusDamaged, _ShipStatusDestroyed shipactions(1) = "Repair Ship"
case _ShipStatusLocked shipactions(1) = "Prepare Ship" shipactions(2) = "Destroy Ship"
case _ShipStatusPrepped 'we can only launch in two sectors if IsGamePhase (_PhaseGalacticaReturns) then shipactions(1) = "Evacuate to Sector 5" shipactions(2) = "Evacuate to Sector 6" shipactions(3) = "Destroy Ship" else shipactions(1) = "Destroy Ship" end if
case _ShipStatusCylonFleet1 to _ShipStatusCylonFleet6 shipactions(1) = "Jump to Main Board" shipactions(2) = "Return to Reserves"
end select
ctl_shipActions.StringItemList = shipactions() end sub 'UpdateShipActions
sub ShipAction dim targetaction, rtncd, i as integer dim shiptype, shipIDs(), shipstatus, msgoff as integer dim actionstr, tmpstr, logstr as string dim tmplst() as string dim shipnamestr, divstr as string
GetShipSheet
shiptype = GetSelectedShipType() shipIDs = GetSelectedShipIDs() shipstatus = GetShipStatus(shiptype, shipIDs(0)) shipnamestr = GetShipName(shiptype, shipIDs(0))
divstr = ", " if ubound(shipIDs) > 0 then ' check to make sure all the selected ships have the same status for i = 1 to ubound(shipIDs) if shipstatus <> GetShipStatus(shiptype, shipIDs(i)) then exit sub end if if i = ubound(shipIDs) then divstr=" & " end if shipnamestr = shipnamestr & divstr & GetShipName(shiptype, shipIDs(i)) next i end if
tmplst = ShipForm.getByName("lstShipAction").SelectedItems() if ubound(tmplst) = -1 then MsgBox "Select an Action to execute.",0,"Ship Action" exit sub end if
actionstr = ShipForm.getByName("lstShipAction").StringItemList(val(tmplst(0)))
select case Left(actionStr, 6) case "Launch", "Deploy", "Move t", "Evacua" 'this is a ship that is either launching into space or moving around... ' could be a viper, civilian, basestar, raider, or Heavy. ' this could also be a prepped civilian being evacuated from New Caprica ' in any case, the end of the string tells us where to go if shiptype = _ShipOccForces then targetaction = _ShipStatusSector1 logstr = shipNameStr & " DEPLOYED on New Caprica"
else targetaction = val(right(actionStr,1)) if left(actionstr, 4) = "Move" then tmpstr = "MOVED" msgoff = 5 elseif left(actionstr, 4) = "Evac" then tmpstr = "EVACUATED" msgoff = 9 else tmpstr = ucase(left(actionStr,6)) & "ED" msgoff = 7 end if logstr = shipNameStr & " " & tmpstr & mid(actionstr,msgoff) end if
case "Damage" targetaction = _ShipStatusDamaged if shiptype = _ShipBasestar then logstr = "" else logstr = shipnamestr & " DAMAGED" end if
case "Destro" logstr = shipnamestr & " DESTROYED" select case shiptype case _ShipViper, _ShipMarkVII, _ShipRaptor, _ShipAssaultRaptor, _ShipCivilian, _ShipBasestar targetaction = _ShipStatusDestroyed
case _ShipOccForces 'this is an Occupation Force destroying a civilian ship if InStr(actionstr, "Civilian") > 0 then targetaction = _ShipStatusActivate logstr = "" else targetaction = _ShipStatusOffBoard end if case else 'cylon ships targetaction = _ShipStatusOffBoard
end select 'shiptype
case "Board " if shiptype = _ShipCenturion then targetaction = _ShipStatusSector1 'offboard centurion boarding galactica logstr = shipnamestr & " BOARDED Galactica" else 'must be a heavy raider targetaction = _ShipStatusActivate logstr = shipnamestr & " REMOVED from Board" end if
case "Advanc" 'centurion or occupuation force advancing logstr = shipnamestr & " ADVANCES (" & shipstatus+1 & ")" targetaction = shipstatus + 1 if shiptype = _ShipCenturion and shipstatus = 4 then MsgBox "Galactica is destroyed by the Centurion. Game Over!" logstr = "Centurion destroys Galactica. GAME OVER." end if
case "Return", "Repair" if left(actionstr, 6) = "Return" then logstr = shipnamestr & " RETURNED to the Reserves" else logstr = shipnamestr & " REPAIRED." end if targetaction = _ShipStatusOffboard
case "Prepar" logstr = shipnamestr & " PREPARED for Evacuation" targetaction = _ShipStatusPrepped
case "Cylon " 'deploy this ship on the Cylon Fleet board targetaction = val(right(actionStr,1)) + 10 logstr = shipnamestr & " DEPLOYED to the " & actionstr
case "Jump t" 'this is a ship in the Cylon Fleet jumping to the main board logstr = shipnamestr & " JUMPED to Sector " & shipstatus - 10 & " on the Main Board from the Cylon Fleet" targetaction = shipstatus - 10
end select
LogThis logstr for i = 0 to ubound(shipIDs) SetShipStatus shiptype, shipIDs(i), targetaction next i 'special case here to check if shiptype = _ShipCivilian and targetaction = 0 then 'if a civilian is being returned to the reserves, we need to reshuffle the civilians. ' we can't do it inside SetShipStatus or we might get multiple reshuffles when the fleet jumps, which would be annoying. ShuffleCivilians TRUE end if if shiptype = _ShipViper or shiptype = _ShipMarkVII or shiptype = _ShipAssaultRaptor then Board_RefreshVipers elseif shiptype = _ShipCivilian then Board_RefreshCivilians end if UpdateShips SetCrisisFlag FALSE, "" end sub 'ShipAction

sub SetShipStatus (shiptype, shipid, ByVal targetstatus) dim centID, civID, rtncd as integer GetShipSheet
if shiptype = _ShipBasestar then if targetstatus=_ShipStatusDamaged then ' Damage the basestar, then don't change any other status DamageBasestar shipid exit sub elseif targetstatus = _ShipStatusDestroyed then Board_ClearSpecial("Thirty-Three") targetstatus = _ShipStatusOffBoard elseif targetstatus = _ShipStatusRemoved then Board_ClearSpecial("Thirty-Three") targetstatus = _ShipStatusDestroyed end if end if
if targetstatus =_ShipStatusActivate then if shiptype = _ShipHeavy then ' Centurion Boards Galactica targetstatus = _ShipStatusOffboard centID = GetAvailableShip (_ShipCenturion) if centID > 0 then SetShipStatus (_ShipCenturion, centID, 1) LogThis GetShipName(_ShipCenturion, centID) & " BOARDS Galactica" else MsgBox "No available Centurions" LogThis "No Centurions available to Board Galactica" end if elseif shiptype = _ShipOccForces then ' Occ Force is deployed targetstatus = _ShipStatusOffboard ' get the top locked civilian, then the top prepped one if that's not available, then destroy it. civID = GetAvailableShip (_ShipCivilian, _ShipStatusLocked) if civID = 0 then civID = GetAvailableShip (_ShipCivilian, _ShipStatusPrepped) end if if civID > 0 then MsgBox GetShipName(_ShipCivilian, civID) & " Destroyed!" LogThis GetShipName(_ShipCivilian, civID) & " DESTROYED!" SetShipStatus (_ShipCivilian, civID, 8) end if end if end if
if targetstatus = _ShipStatusOffboard then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColOffBrd), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "X" if ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSpecial) > 0 then ClearSpecial(shiptype, shipid) end if if ShipType = _ShipRaider then if ShipID = GetScarID() then UnScar end if if ShipType = _ShipRaider and GetAvailableShipCnt(_ShipRaider) = ShipCnt(_ShipRaider) then ' last raider is gone Board_ClearSpecial("Dogfight") end if end if else ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType,_ShipColOffBrd),ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "" end if
if ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSector) > 0 then if targetstatus >= _ShipStatusSector1 and targetstatus <= _ShipStatusSector6 then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSector), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).value = targetstatus if ShipType = _ShipCivilian then ' when a civ launches from New Caprica... ClearSpecial _ShipCivilian, ShipID end if else ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType,_ShipColSector),ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "" end if end if
if ShipCol(ShipType,_ShipColDamaged) > 0 then if targetstatus = _ShipStatusDamaged then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDamaged), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "X" ClearSpecial(shiptype, shipid) else ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDamaged), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "" end if end if
if ShipCol(ShipType,_ShipColDestroyed) > 0 then if targetstatus = _ShipStatusDestroyed then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDestroyed), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "X" if ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSpecial) > 0 then ClearSpecial(shiptype, shipid) end if if ShipType =_ShipCivilian then 'we've destroyed a civilian ship, need to reduce resources accordingly. CivilianDestroyed shipid end if if shiptype =_ShipCivilian or shiptype =_ShipBasestar then Board_ClearSpecial("Thirty-Three") end if else ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColDestroyed), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "" end if end if
if targetstatus = _ShipStatusLocked then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSpecial), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "Locked"
elseif targetstatus= _ShipStatusPrepped then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSpecial), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "Prepped" end if
if ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColCylonFleet) > 0 then if targetstatus >= _ShipStatusCylonFleet1 and targetstatus <= _ShipStatusCylonFleet6 then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColCylonFleet), Shiprow(ShipType) + ShipID).value = targetstatus - 10 else ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColCylonFleet),Shiprow(ShipType) + ShipID).string = "" end if
end if
if ShipType =_ShipCivilian then Board_RefreshCivilians elseif ShipType =_ShipViper or ShipType = _ShipMarkVII or shiptype = _ShipAssaultRaptor then Board_RefreshVipers end if end sub 'SetShipStatus

sub ClearSpecial (shiptype, shipid) dim tmpval as double dim tmpstr, tmptar as string dim pilotID, i, j as integer
'we get this when a special flag may have been set and the ship is going away... 'there are three types with special flags (civs used to have them but they got removed) ' Viper = Pilot [send the pilot to the hangar deck] ' Civilian = Lock/Prep [just clear the field, this should be destroyed or in a sector now] ' Basestar = Damage [put the damage tokens back and reshuffle]

if shiptype =_ShipViper or shiptype = _ShipMarkVII or shiptype = _ShipAssaultRaptor then pilotid = GetPlayerID(ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(ShipType, _ShipColSpecial), ShipRow(ShipType) + ShipID).string) SetPlayerViper pilotID, 0 SetPlayerLoc pilotID, "Hangar Deck" LogThis GetPlayerName(pilotID) & " MOVED to the Hangar Deck"
elseif shiptype = _ShipBasestar then 'find the tokens and reset them, then reshuffle for i = 1 to 4 if ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol + 1,_BaseDamageRow + i).string = shipid then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol + 1,_BaseDamageRow + i).string = "" end if next i ShuffleBasestarDamage

select case civnum case 1 to 2 ' do nothing, these were decoys MsgBox shipname & " destroyed: Decoy - no resources lost!" case 3 to 8 ReduceResource 3 'population MsgBox shipname & " destroyed: Population reduced by 1!" case 9 to 10 ReduceResource 3 'population ReduceResource 3 'population MsgBox shipname & " destroyed: Population reduced by 2!" case 11 ReduceResource 0 'fuel ReduceResource 3 'population MsgBox shipname & " destroyed: Population and Fuel reduced by 1!" case 12 ReduceResource 2 'morale ReduceResource 3 'population MsgBox shipname & " destroyed: Population and Morale reduced by 1!" end select ClearSpecial _shipCivilian, shipid end sub
sub ShuffleBasestarDamage dim tmpval, sortval(6) as double dim tmpstr, tmptar as string dim i, j as integer
GetShipSheet
for i = 1 to 6 if ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol + 1,_BaseDamageRow + i).string <> "" OR _ (NOT ObjectiveIsIonianNebula() AND _ (ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol,_BaseDamageRow + i).string = "Collateral Damage" or _ ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol,_BaseDamageRow + i).string = "Damage to Personnel") ) then sortval(i)= 2 else sortval(i)= rnd() end if next i
for i = 1 to 5 for j = i + 1 to 6 if sortval(i) > sortval(j) then tmpval = sortval(i) tmpstr = ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol, _BaseDamageRow + i).string tmptar = ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol + 1, _BaseDamageRow + i).string
sortval(i) = sortval(j) ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol, _BaseDamageRow + i).string = ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol, _BaseDamageRow + j).string ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol + 1, _BaseDamageRow + i).string = ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol + 1, _BaseDamageRow + j).string
sortval(j) = tmpval ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol, _BaseDamageRow + j).string = tmpstr ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BaseDamageCol + 1, _BaseDamageRow + j).string = tmptar end if next j next i end sub 'ShuffleBasestarDamage

function SweepShips (shipType as integer, sweepAll as boolean) as integer 'removes all of the given shipType from the board, generally used on jumping... dim shipid, sweepcnt as integer GetShipSheet
sweepcnt = 0 for shipid = 1 to ShipCnt(shipType) if (GetShipStatus(shiptype, shipid) > 0 and GetShipStatus(shiptype,shipid) < 7) OR sweepAll OR _ (shipType =_ShipViper and GetViperPilot(shipID,_ShipViper) <> "") OR _ (shipType = _ShipMarkVII and GetViperPilot(shipID, _ShipMarkVII) <> "") OR _ (shipType = _ShipAssaultRaptor and GetViperPilot(shipID, _ShipAssaultRaptor) <> "") _ then SetShipStatus shiptype, shipid, 0 sweepcnt = sweepcnt + 1 end if next shipid
if sweepcnt > 0 then LogThis sweepcnt & " " & ShipNames(shipType) & iif(sweepcnt > 1, "s", "") & " removed from the board" end if SweepShips = sweepcnt end function 'SweepShips

sub ShuffleCivilians (optional inPlace as boolean) dim tmpval, sortval(12) as double dim tmpstr,tmpOff, tmpDestroy as string dim i, j as integer
GetShipSheet
'inPlace means we don't want to touch anything that's destroyed or on the board. ' it's called when we return a civilian to the reserves outside of a jump, otherwise we assume everything is either destroyed or offboard if IsMissing(inPlace) then ' change this so that we are always inPlace. that way if "Civilian A" is destroyed, "Civilian A" will never be in the game again. ' inPlace = FALSE ' we don't actually call this anywhere with FALSE inPlace = TRUE end if
for i = 1 to 12 if inPlace then if GetShipStatus(_ShipCivilian,i) = _ShipStatusOffBoard then sortval(i)=rnd() else sortval(i) = -1 end if else if GetShipStatus(_ShipCivilian,i) <> _ShipStatusDestroyed then sortval(i)=rnd() else sortval(i)=2 ' any civilians that are destroyed need to move to the end of the line end if end if next i
for i=1 to 11 for j=i+1 to 12 if sortval(i) > sortval(j) AND sortval(i) <> -1 and sortval(j)<> -1 then tmpval=sortval(i) tmpstr=ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColName)+1,ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + i).string
sortval(i)=sortval(j) ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColName)+1,ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + i).string=ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColName)+1,ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + j).string
sortval(j)=tmpval ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColName)+1,ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + j).string=tmpstr end if next j next i
'now reflag everyone for i=1 to 12 if sortval(i) <> -1 then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColSector),ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + i).string = ""
if sortval(i) <> 2 then ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColOffBrd),ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + i).string = "X" ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColDestroyed),ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + i).string = "" else ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColOffBrd),ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + i).string = "" ShipSheet.GetCellByPosition(ShipCol(_ShipCivilian,_ShipColDestroyed),ShipRow(_ShipCivilian) + i).string = "X" end if end if next i
Board_RefreshCivilians end sub 'ShuffleCivilians
